channel.title: NPC Help
channel.description:
I know i need to edit; actionHander.java, dialogueHandler.java and i think clickButtons.java?? ... what i don't know is how to do it.
What i'm looking for is that when the player talks to the npc he tells him about the server and gives him a key at the end?

item.title: NPC Help
item.dc:creator: @V113 V1
item.description:
@V113 wrote:

dialogue 30 is “thanks, here’s 5m”
dialogue 32 is “here’s some gear” “use it to make a spirit wolf pouch”

so i need to add something under the case 500: so that if the player has a spirit wolf pouch in their inventory it says “thanks, here’s 5m” … if they dont it says dialogue 32…

what do i add under case 500: ?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Help
item.dc:creator: @V113 V1
item.description:
@V113 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

^ Is that code going in ActionHandler.java?

yeah, ive done it so that he talks a bit… gives you the items to create a new item… and then when they have created that item they talk to him again and he will say a different thing

item.title: NPC Help
item.dc:creator: @V113 V1
item.description:
@V113 wrote:

[code] case 500:

				c.getDH().sendDialogues(30,npcType);
			} else {
				c.getDH().sendDialogues(32,npcType);
			}			
		break;[/code]

Ok ive got that sorted… its pretty much done… What do i add under the ‘case 500:’ so that if the player has the item id 421 in his inventory it encounters the following?
(you are being a great help btw, thanks very much)

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Help

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

That would be under the dialogue. If you have to add more dialogue, just put:

Under the:

When you have all of your dialogues added, just simply add:

Nothing to add in ClickingButtons.java, unless you have options to choose.
